reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress soft and comfortable, with pretty colors and decent quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but runs big
items.body: Runs big. I’m a size 4/6 and the small was bigger than it appears in the pics. But very soft and comfortable Read more
items.author: W.A.G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy
items.body: So warm and cozy and super cute. Wish it had a style with belt loops though Read more
items.author: Melanie D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs a bit larger than size
items.author: mitzi

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
items.body: The sweater is soft, but it fits pretty boxy and when you wash it, little hairs get everywhere so it looks like you just had a cat roll all over your clothes. I’ll be returning Read more
items.author: Leslie Butterfield

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous colors - oversized, slouchy sweater dress - not fitted at all.
items.body: The colors are really pretty and it’s a big, oversized slouchy sweater dress. The material is soft and it has no shape at all which works for my figure but I am 5’2” 127lbs. Honestly, if you are a bigger girlie, you would have decide if you like the way it hangs on you. It definitely won’t hug your curves so there’s that. I love the way the sleeves fit. Read more
items.author: KO

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Medium and Small is the same. Both are the same size - and huge.
items.body: I started off with a Medium, because that is what I wear and it was huge. Ordered the Small. And the Small is no different that the Medium. So disappointed. Not sure whether to try the X-small (if they have one) or just give up. Cute dress on the model, but it is huge and boxy. Read more
items.author: M. Angelo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compliments
items.body: Comfortable, warm, true to size I am size 6 and medium is perfect Read more
items.author: Copchop

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars At home or on the go!!!!
items.body: Fabulous for cold weather!!! Add tights and a little heel, and you are off!!! Lovely feeling and fit!!! Definitely put tights and heels have a good time!!!! Read more
items.author: Connie Mitchell

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Multicoloured, Apricot and White, Green and White, Khaki Colorblock. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
